content.raw:
in my catkin workspace, I do
~~~
cd [...]/catkin_ws
catkin_make install
cd install
source setup.bash
source install/share/drcsim/setup.bash
gazebo
~~~
then you should be able to insert atlas from gzclient under `[catkin_ws]/install/share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models/`.

[see example](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OP191AM6Hiw&feature=youtu.be).

Currently sim crashes when inserting multiple atlases because we haven't anticipated multiple AtlasPlugins.

in my catkin workspace, I do

cd [...]/catkin_ws
catkin_make install
cd install
source setup.bash
source install/share/drcsim/setup.bash
gazebo

then you should be able to insert atlas from gzclient under [catkin_ws]/install/share/drcsim_gazebo_standalone_models/.

see example.

Currently sim crashes when inserting multiple atlases because we haven't anticipated multiple AtlasPlugins.
